about_the_game:
Lasher class for Shades Of Rayna.

Lasher is a class in the game and uses whip as main weapon and just like other classes, has 10 active and 5 passive skills.

Actives:
Stumble - Swing your whip close to the ground twice, damage and slow enemies
Scratch - Swing your whip back-to-back twice, dealing area damage on hit
Lashblast - Swing and hit your whip to the ground to create a blast
Zapwhip - Stick your whip to the ground dealing area damage, then pull it back and create an explosion
Sear - Swing your whip to create a fire area under the character
Whirltox - Swing with your whip dealing poisonous damage and shoot poisonous projectiles simultaneously
Lilacurst - Swing your whip three times, and each time throw 3, 3, and 5 bombs respectively
Shatter - Swing your whip three times and each time blast cold wind in your direction
Whiplash - Swing your whip multiple times to slice the enemies in front of you
Zephyr - Swing your whip repeatedly to roll with it towards mouse location

Passives:
Thrash - At every 10th kill, you blast your surroundings
Steal - Your basic attacks steal 1% of your max health amount of life to your health
Second Chance - When your health reach 0, you resurrect with %50 health (Triggers once in a map)
Rejuvenate - Every damaged enemy fills up Rejuvenate bar. When maxed, you regen for 5 seconds
Guardian - When you get hit 10 times, you gain Invulnerability for 2 seconds

  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480
